skillTree.localised_description: The most impressive Nightmares are those reared on fresh blood. Such noble monstrosities are worthy mounts.
Hellsteeds are vicious. Vampires that dabble in the binding of beasts delight in breaking these wild creatures to their will.
This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +25%

skillTree.localised_description: A dark pact has been made with darker Gods to guarantee victory.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 when attacking
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: See the future, change the present.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing
Miscast base chance: -10%

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster attunes the magic of the wild, channelling its ancient and arcane power.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Wild Heart"
Passive ability: "Life Leeching"

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

skillTree.localised_description: Waldakir does his best work from the shadows, unseen by mortal men.

effects.description: Ability: "Out of Sight"

enabled_if: No enemy Lord or Hero presence in ability range.

skillTree.localised_description: Stolen from a champion of the Empire many years ago, this blade possesses special properties when used against daemons and other mystical creatures.

effects.description: Ability: "Imbuement of Fire"
Ability: "Blessed Blade of the Empire"

skillTree.localised_description: Never to be found without allies, should the moment arise when he has to flee, Rahtep always knows to call on those who can help him.

effects.description: Ability: "Eternal Guardians"

skillTree.localised_description: The silent howls of the spirits drawn forth by Waldakir please him immeasureably. He imagines them a chorus, singing arias to aid his magic.

effects.description:
Unlocks Hero recruitment: Banshee
	(all provinces)

Hero action success chance: +10% for Banshees
	(all characters)
Hero capacity: +2 for Banshees

skillTree.localised_description: Accursed relics from ancient barrows cleave the soul as easily as they part the flesh.

effects.description:
Attribute: Devastating Flanker for Cairn Wraith and Hexwraith units
	(Lord's army)

Bonus vs Infantry: +8 for Cairn Wraith and Hexwraiths units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Rahtep has shown an uncanny ability to return when thought dead by his enemies.

effects.description: Ability: "Tomb Rebirth"
Passive ability: "The Hunger"

skillTree.localised_description: "Look into mine eyes, mortal; what glories do you see?"

effects.description: Melee defence: +6
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.localised_description: The sword-strikes of mortal man are but clumsy, childish lunges before the preternatural speed of a Vampire.

effects.description: Melee attack: +6
Melee attack: +12

skillTree.localised_description: The strength of this Vampire to endure the centuries is beyond compare.

effects.description: Hit points: +7%

skillTree.localised_description: To look upon this Undead Lord is to witness true and absolute horror!

effects.description: Attribute: Causes Terror

skillTree.localised_description: Nebulous nature spirits assail the foe, clawing at them with hands not nearly as insubstantial as they appear.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -15%

skillTree.localised_description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: "Forces of Necromancy, hear the request of your most-studious adept: flow through me according to my will!"

effects.description: Passive ability: "Greater Arcane Conduit"

skillTree.localised_description: "I am mighty, none dare challenge me!"

effects.description: Character's aura leadership effect: +5

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Interlopers? You must be very brave, very stupid, or very desperate to enter my domain. It matters nothing what your reasons are. You will all die here, and then you will serve me even in death!"
